capsules_submitted.utterance: I think it's interesting that Professor McGonagall is considered an adult. I mean, she does have a lot of experience and wisdom, but at the same time, she can be quite stern and intimidating, especially when it comes to discipline.

You know, I've always been fascinated by Professor McGonagall's life. She was indeed an adult when she became the Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts, and it's amazing to think about how much experience and wisdom she must have brought to that role. I mean, can you imagine being in her shoes, teaching one of the most talented young witches and wizards of our time? It's a pretty daunting task, but I'm sure she handled it with ease.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool. I mean, who wouldn't want to be able to see through magic with just a pair of lenses? It's like she has this whole other world going on right in front of us. And I have to say, I'm pretty sure she does look square-lenses - I've seen her wear them before and they're definitely distinctive.
